courses.title: MERN Stack Development

courses.title: .NET Full Stack Development
courses.description: Build modern web applications with the .NET full-stack framework, including ASP.NET Core and Angular.

courses.description: Learn PHP-based full-stack web development with popular frameworks like Laravel and Vue.js.
